title:
KYBO 3.0.0
***Westerns***
The Lone Ranger (2013) http://vodlocker.com/5nhhk6s2bc66 http://www.destroythecyb.org/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/lone_ranger_ver12_xlg.jpg http://i.ytimg.com/vi/nlrQD8Kvk6M/maxresdefault.jpg Native American warrior Tonto recounts the untold tales that transformed John Reid, a man of the law, into a legend of justice.
Django Unchained (2012) http://vidspot.net/8xgtpiwycwe2 http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/8/8b/Django_Unchained_Poster.jpg http://www.thebuzzmedia.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/2012_django_unchained_001.jpg With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.
Cowboys & Aliens (2011) http://vodlocker.com/zr1acuejqnxl http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/f/ff/Cowboys_%26_Aliens.jpg https://heavyeditorial.files.wordpress.com/2011/07/cowboys_and_aliens3.jpg A spaceship arrives in Arizona, 1873, to take over the Earth, starting with the Wild West region. A posse of cowboys and natives are all that stand in their way.
True Grit (2010) http://sharesix.com/79f2ar2uxdiv http://la-screenwriter.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/2010_true_grit_poster_002.jpg http://www.doblu.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/true10grit3715.jpg A tough U.S. Marshal helps a stubborn teenager track down her father's murderer.
Maverick (1994) http://thefile.me/e1oehrdcc8t4 http://www.c1n3.org/d/donner01r/Images/1994%20Maverick%20(ing)%2002.jpg http://m.cdn.blog.hu/li/lisztesmegmondjaatutit/image/Maverick/maverick-1994-04-g.jpg Bret Maverick, needing money for a poker tournament, faces various comic mishaps and challenges, including a charming woman thief.
Young Guns 2 (1990) http://sharesix.com/f/KDb2LN http://downloadmoviefullfree.info/wp-content/uploads/Young-Guns-II.jpg http://www.ew.com/sites/default/files/i/imgs/100730//chato-cameo-young-guns-2_400.jpg Billy "The Kid" and his gang is wanted by the law, and when "Doc" Scurlock and Chavez are captured, Billy has to save them. They escape and set south for Mexico. "Let's hire a thief to catch one", John S. Chisum said, so he paid Pat Garrett, one of Billy's former partners, $1000 for the killing of William H. Bonney aka Billy "The Kid".
Dances with Wolves (1990) http://movreel.com/b9h4ohpbm23z.html http://posterpress.us/uploads/d/dances_with_wolves_1990.jpg http://cdn.hitfix.com/photos/3018745/Dances-With-Wolves-1990.jpg Lt. John Dunbar, exiled to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Indians, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.
Young Guns (1988) http://vodlocker.com/8ldvn49829of http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130621145323/youngguns/images/d/d4/Young_Guns.jpg http://filmpjekijken.com/Content/upload/SheenYoungGuns.jpg A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted.
True Grit (1969) http://www.movshare.net/video/5wwzol45keaqw http://covers.box.sk/newsimg/dvdmov/max1353948653-front-cover.jpg http://talkiegazette.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/True-Grit-1969-2.jpg A drunken, hard-nosed U.S. Marshal and a Texas Ranger help a stubborn young woman track down her father's murderer in Indian territory.
The Good, the Bad and the Ugly (1966) http://thefile.me/8ngd51vkxdcz http://top5lists.net/wp-content/uploads/2011/02/600full-the-good-the-bad-and-the-ugly-poster.jpg http://cdn-images.9cloud.us/848/piccit_the_good_the_bad_and_the_ugl_1565473366.jpg A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.
The Magnificent Seven (1960) http://xvidstage.com/32qkw3rj63m5 http://image.tmdb.org/t/p/original/7s07p5OVht3SLSxa7MAEt3Nzb5H.jpg http://55.imagebam.com/temporarylink/Vx5UB-UmJAgFUerDOntJ6w/1427973884/16831/168306172/3encode_TheMagnificentSeven1960.png An oppressed Mexican peasant village assembles seven gunfighters to help defend their homes.
